Name: Give Me Your Coins
About the game: Give Me Your Coins is a fast-paced platformer with simple controls and challenging levels. The main character is a treasure hunter, who was eaten by the Evil Chest. Your goal will be to dodge enemies and traps, pick up all the gold inside the world of the Evil Chest, and beat him up for what he did. You must constantly improve your platforming skills in order to become the best adventurer at Give Me Your Coins and get your name high on the World Leader Board. Simple and responsive controls - your skills and reaction is only thing that matter. Use jumping from the walls, sliding and other intricacies of the gameplay to achieve the best results. Each level has its own leader board. Become the best player in the world. Every monster inside the chest will try to stop you. Can you outsmart them? Punch the living hell out of your sworn enemy. The more coins you collect at each level, the stronger Evil Chest will be beaten. Discover new and amazing challenges with each new level.
